name: Sweet Escape from Jakarta
description:
It's time to escape from the hustle and bustle of Jakarta!

On this trip, we will visit some interesting spots on the foot of Gunung Salak (Salak Mountain) - 1-2 hours from Jakarta. You may say it's a countryside, where you can see real villages, rice fields, and beautiful views of nature. What even better is: these places are off the beaten path!

The best time to go on this tour is on weekdays, but weekend should be okay too, despite of more traffic.
